output.name: LoopCrateCycle
output.description: LoopCrateCycle is a B Corps-certified company dedicated to creating a future without waste. We simplify the process of reusing and recycling by collecting items not accepted by city services and matching them with local partners who can use these materials sustainably. Our mission empowers communities to waste less, while we celebrate the impact of our work in diverting over 29 million pounds of waste from landfills. We promote a culture of sustainability, teamwork, and personal growth, offering a flexible work environment and a strong benefits package.
